name: YesorNo
0:
”Alexa, Yes or No”
”Alexa, open Yes or No”
”Alexa, start Yes or No”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: yes or no
des:
Sometimes in life its very difficult to decide on something seemingly easy to figure out, let Alexa help! This skill will simply give you a Yes or No answer upon request. Maybe you need to break a tie, figure out if you should go out or not, call in sick today, eat that last piece of cake.. put the fate of your decision in the hands of a third party.

If you are going to randomly pick an answer in life, you might as well let a computer do it for you. You will be surprised how useful this skill is, give it a try and find out.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
